data.speaker: Friend
data.content: Hey, you ok? Class just ended.

data.speaker: Player
data.content: Oh my god! I'm so embarrassed... I can't believe I slept through my first class!

data.speaker: Friend
data.content: No worries, you didn't miss much. We can go over my notes together if you want.

data.speaker: Player
data.content: My name is Liv, nice to meet you!

data.speaker: Lev
data.content: Haha, oh it's lunch time, I remember there is a nice chinese restaurant upstairs, you wanna eat together?

data.speaker: Player
data.content: Why not? I am starving now, let's go!
